text.jpText: 前だけを見て ひたすらにボクは進む
text.enText: My eyes fixed on the prize\nI pick up the pace, racing even further

text.jpText: Never Looking Back そう決して
text.enText: Never looking back\nInstead I make this oath

text.jpText: 振り向かず 未来へ
降り止まぬ雨が 行く手阻もうと
text.enText: Though the downpour continues on\nAttempting to drown me out

text.jpText: この[決意]<おもい>は 消せはしない
text.enText: The voice inside my heart\nContinues to shout

text.jpText: 煙る視界も ぬかるんだ足元も
text.enText: Even with the fog up ahead\nAnd the track a muddy mess to tread

text.jpText: ボクを止めるなんて絶対 出来ないから
text.enText: I race on, my spirit still ablaze\nNo obstacle is getting in my way!

text.jpText: 思い通りにいかなくて 泣きたい日も
text.enText: Some things don't go as planned\nBut even on days filled with tearful cries

text.jpText: Don't Give It Up 信じてる
text.enText: I don't give it up! Gotta believe in me!
And the flame blazing deep in my heart!

text.jpText: 約束しよう もし何を試されても
text.enText: Today we make an oath\nTo brave the trials in our future path

text.jpText: Never Looking Back そう決して
text.enText: Never looking back\nI'll stand by my oath
To carry on\nand believe in myself!
